Major_Arcs.title: Introduction and Initial Mystery of The Human Meteor
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces the comic book, the main character Human Meteor, and sets up the initial mystery involving divers and a waterfront plot.

sub_scenes.title: Origin and Taxi Job Setup
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces The Human Meteor and his alter ego Duke O'Dowd, establishing his dual life and setting the stage for the initial conflict.

narrative_arcs.title: Duke's Taxi Ride to the Waterfront

sub_scenes.title: Confrontation and Initial Investigation
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene focuses on Human Meteor's direct confrontation with the 'G-Men', his recovery, and the initial plan to investigate the yacht.

sub_scenes.title: Yacht Infiltration and Setup Realization
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene details the events on the yacht, including Toby's infiltration, the playboys' activities, and Duke's realization of a setup.

narrative_arcs.title: Yacht Deck Work and Cabin Trap
Submarine Plot and Toby's True Role

sub_scenes.title: Underwater Reconnaissance and Submarine Discovery
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene transitions to the underwater setting where Human Meteor investigates and discovers the sunken submarine and the torpedo plot.

Major_Arcs.title: Underwater Conflict and Ship Attack
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc details the underwater confrontation between Human Meteor and the divers, leading to an explosive attack on the enemy ship.

sub_scenes.title: Underwater Divers Encounter and Hostility
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene focuses on the initial encounter and escalating hostility between Human Meteor and the divers near the sunken submarine.

narrative_arcs.title: Divers' Initial Encounter with Human Meteor
Human Meteor's Intervention and Divers' Hostility
Human Meteor's Threat and Divers' Retaliation

sub_scenes.title: Human Meteor's Torpedo Attack on Ship
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts Human Meteor preparing and executing his attack on the ship using a torpedo, leading to chaos and fear on the surface.

narrative_arcs.title: Discovery of Peter's Condition on Ship
Namor's Determined Final Attack and Ship Crew's Fear

Major_Arcs.title: Yacht Investigation and Peter's Exposure
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc focuses on Duke's investigation on the yacht, leading to the exposure of Peter's treachery and a brief period of recovery.

sub_scenes.title: Yacht Confrontation and Search
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene details Duke's boat chase to the yacht, his confrontation with Peter, and his search for the depth map in Peter's cabin.

narrative_arcs.title: Search for the Depth Map in Peter's Cabin
Exposing Peter's Treachery to the Officer

sub_scenes.title: Resolution and Hospital Visit
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene provides a brief transition and then focuses on the hospital visit to Holden, offering a moment of calm after the action.

narrative_arcs.title: Evening Reflection after a Chaotic Day
Toby's Home and Invitation to Visit Holden

Major_Arcs.title: Liberty Lads and the Bus Garage Mystery
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc shifts to a new narrative thread involving the Liberty Lads and then transitions into a mystery at a bus garage, involving Skip and Chuck.

sub_scenes.title: Liberty Lads Action Scene
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene briefly showcases the Liberty Lads in action against Nazis, setting a patriotic tone before transitioning to a new story.

narrative_arcs.title: Liberty Lads in Action Against Nazis

sub_scenes.title: Ambulance and Bus Garage Investigation Begins
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene starts the mystery at the bus garage, initiated by the arrival of an ambulance and the curiosity of Skip and Chuck.

narrative_arcs.title: The Dropped Wallet and the Bus Garage Address
Marine Salutes a Civilian - Major Bronson

sub_scenes.title: Bus Garage Confrontation and Abduction
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene details Skip and Chuck's arrival at the bus garage, their confrontation with the police, and their abduction by Mr. Horst.

sub_scenes.title: Interrogation and Uprising at the Bus Garage
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene covers the interrogation of Skip and Chuck, the escalating threats, and the sudden outbreak of fighting and betrayal.

sub_scenes.title: Escape, Rescue, and Resolution of Bus Garage Crisis
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene details Skip and Chuck's escape, the discovery of sabotage plans, the Marine response, and the resolution of the conflict with the Nazi spies at the bus garage.

narrative_arcs.title: Discovery of Sabotage Plans in Secret Office
Resolution and Victory Over Nazi Spies

Major_Arcs.title: The Champ and Henry in South America
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces a new adventure with The Champ and Henry in South America, facing soldiers and uncovering a kidnapping plot.

sub_scenes.title: Introduction of The Champ and Setting in South America
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces The Champ and Henry and establishes the new setting in South America with soldiers searching for them.

narrative_arcs.title: Introduction of The Champ and Henry and the Nazi Threat
Setting the Scene in South America and the Soldiers' Search
Confrontation and Fight in the Desert

sub_scenes.title: Military Interrogation and Escape Plan
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene focuses on the soldiers apprehending and interrogating civilians, followed by Champ and Henry's escape and decision to seek help.

narrative_arcs.title: Escape and the Decision to Seek the American Consul
Explanation of Suspicion: Rosita's Kidnapping and El Tigre

Major_Arcs.title: Kidnapping and Rescue of Rosita
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc details the kidnapping of Rosita by El Tigre and the subsequent efforts to locate and rescue her.

sub_scenes.title: Forced Car Ride and Arrival at Hideout
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts the forced car ride led by El Tigre and the arrival at a house where a misunderstanding occurs.

narrative_arcs.title: Forced Entry into Car and Commanded Drive
Suspicious Car Ride and Destination Order

sub_scenes.title: Planning and Infiltration of El Tigre's Hideout
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene details the planning to confront El Tigre, the preparation for action, and the infiltration of his hideout using a distraction.

narrative_arcs.title: Preparation for Action on Tamale Street
Infiltration of El Tigre's Hideout with Stage Dollars

sub_scenes.title: Interrogation and Search for Rosita
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene focuses on the interrogation of a man, possibly El Tigre, and the search for Rosita's location, revealing a twist about El Tigre's motives.

narrative_arcs.title: Searching for Rosita and Threatening El Tigre

sub_scenes.title: Rescue Mission and Rosita's Recovery
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts the urgent actions taken to rescue Rosita, including receiving news of her location, the horseback journey, and the eventual rescue.

narrative_arcs.title: Ride to Headquarters and Rescue Resolve
Citadel Escape and Rear Entrance Strategy
Machine Gun Deployment and Rosita's Intervention

Major_Arcs.title: Devil Dog Dolan in the Jungle
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc shifts to a jungle setting and focuses on Devil Dog Dolan's mission, combat, and complex interactions with native tribes.

sub_scenes.title: Jungle Combat and Initial Report
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces Devil Dog Dolan in jungle combat and then transitions to a formal report being given to a superior officer.

narrative_arcs.title: Jungle Combat with Devil Dog Dolan

sub_scenes.title: Confession, Justification, and Marine Action Plan
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene presents a confession and justification for disobeyed orders, followed by Marines planning their next course of action.

sub_scenes.title: Jungle Infiltration and Ambush
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene details Dolan's arrival in the jungle, his exploration, and the ambush by native warriors.

sub_scenes.title: Capture, Interrogation, and Plan Acquisition
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts the aftermath of the ambush, focusing on interrogation, forced compliance, and the acquisition of the sub detector plans.

narrative_arcs.title: Note Writing and Plan Negotiation under Duress
Devil Dog's Recovery and Plan Acquisition

sub_scenes.title: Arson, Marine Attack, and Dolan's Capture
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene details Dolan's arson, the marine attack in response, and Dolan's eventual capture amidst the chaos.

narrative_arcs.title: Native Huts Ablaze Amidst Marine Assault

sub_scenes.title: Dolan's Jungle Fight, Native Homage, and New Alliance
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts Dolan's encounter with natives in the jungle, a fight leading to the Chief's death, unexpected homage, and a subsequent alliance.

narrative_arcs.title: Dolan's Jungle Entrance and Initial Encounter
Fight with Natives and Chief's Demise
Grauer's Dialogue with Native and Alliance

sub_scenes.title: Captain's Dilemma, Attack on Sam, and Dolan's Discipline
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene covers the Captain's difficult decision, an attack on Sam, the officers' intervention, and Dolan's subsequent disciplinary action and acceptance.

narrative_arcs.title: Shore Leave Rescinded and Dolan's Discipline

Major_Arcs.title: The Twinkle Twins and the Burgess Murder Mystery
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces a new story featuring the Twinkle Twins, Dan and Diane, and their investigation into the murder of Robert Burgess.

sub_scenes.title: Introduction to Twinkle Twins and Murder Briefing
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces the Twinkle Twins and sets up their new case - the murder of Robert Burgess - via a briefing at the newspaper office.

narrative_arcs.title: Introduction to the Twinkle Twins Story
Newspaper Office Briefing on Burgess Murder

sub_scenes.title: Police Station Visit and Hospital Lead
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene details Dan and Diane's visit to the police station, where they learn Reilly is hospitalized, redirecting their investigation.

narrative_arcs.title: Police Station Inquiry about Reilly's Skip

sub_scenes.title: Hospital Investigation and Blood Type Revelation
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene focuses on Dan and Diane's visit to the hospital, their interaction with hospital staff, and the crucial revelation about Reilly's illness and blood type.

sub_scenes.title: Farnacci Connection and Research Request
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene details Dan and Diane's realization about Farnacci's involvement and their decision to get Elijah to research the connections.

narrative_arcs.title: Candy Store Phone Call to Elijah about Farnacci
Decision to Locate Tom Reilly in Irish Section

sub_scenes.title: Search in Irish Section and Mrs. Murphy's Revelation
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene focuses on Dan and Diane's search in the Irish section and their meeting with Mrs. Murphy, who reveals the truth about Reilly's actions and Farnacci's manipulation.

narrative_arcs.title: Searching for Tom Reilly in the Irish Section
Mrs. Murphy's Revelation about Reilly and Farnacci

sub_scenes.title: Danger to Reilly and Dramatic Escape
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene highlights the danger Reilly faces from Farnacci's mobsters and depicts his dramatic escape from Mrs. Murphy's house.

narrative_arcs.title: Reilly's Coal Chute Escape and Diane's Pursuit

sub_scenes.title: Medical Emergency and Community Blood Drive
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts the aftermath of the shooting, the urgent medical response, and the community's mobilization to donate blood to save Reilly.

narrative_arcs.title: Ambulance Transport and Concern for Victims
Failed Blood Donation Match and Community Appeal
Urgent Call for Blood and Community Response

sub_scenes.title: Resolution and Farnacci's Arrest
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene concludes the Burgess murder case with Farnacci's arrest and imprisonment, and celebrates Reilly's daughter's recovery.

narrative_arcs.title: Decision to Arrest Farnacci and Police Action
Police Raid on Poolroom and Arrest
